tool_description: This API will provide instant access to all NFL leagues and cups with latest game scores, odds, bookmakers, stats, standings and historical data.
name: NFL API
title: NFL API

api_list.name: NFL Weekly Schedule
NFL Team Schedule
NFL Injuries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nfl-api1.p.rapidapi.com/nfl-injuries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nfl-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: NFL Scoreboard
Get Play By Play
api_list.description: Gets the NFL game play-by-play data for a specified game.

api_list.name: Get Box Score
api_list.description: Gets the NFL game box score data for a specified game.

api_list.name: NFL Summary
api_list.description:
Gets the NFL game summary data for a specified game.

Game id. i.e: 401220403

api_list.name: NFL Picks
api_list.description:
Gets the NFL PickCenter data for a specified game.

**id** Game id. i.e: 401220403

api_list.name: NFL Schedule
api_list.description:
Gets the NFL schedule data for a specified date if available.

If you want the current schedule, make sure the parameter **current = true.**

optional_parameters.name: current
optional_parameters.description: default: false. If true, it will return the current schedule.

api_list.name: NFL Standings
api_list.description: Gets the team standings for the NFL.

api_list.name: NFL Team List
api_list.description: Gets the list of all NFL teams their identification info for ESPN.

print(response.json())

api_list.name: NFL Team Info
api_list.description: Gets the team info for a specific NFL team.

api_list.name: NFL Team
api_list.description: Gets the team roster information for a specific NFL team.
